extracted_playbook.title: Renew Certificate with Customer-Specific Hostname
extracted_playbook.description: Adjust the hostname to a customer-specific one that does not contain the serial number to renew the certificate.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Unauthorized Access to Automation Components
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that no unauthorized access can take place to automation components by implementing security measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Internet Access for Automation Components
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that automation components do not have direct access to Internet resources and cannot be accessed from insecure networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Security Measures for Automation Components
extracted_playbook.description: Use available security measures such as authentication and authorization groups to protect automation components.

cve_id: QHA200, moneo appliance, <= 1.9.3 | QHA210, moneo appliance, <= 1.9.3
